generic <typename TRecord> public interface class IVectorizableTextSearch

Docs.typeparam: The record data model to use for retrieving data from the store.
Docs.summary: Contains a method for doing a vector search using text that will be vectorized downstream.

Public Function VectorizableTextSearchAsync (searchText As String, Optional options As VectorSearchOptions = Nothing, Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of VectorSearchResults(Of TRecord))

Docs.param: The text to search the store with.
The options that control the behavior of the search.
The to monitor for cancellation requests. The default is .
Docs.summary: Search the vector store for records that match the given text and filter. The text string will be vectorized downstream and used for the vector search.
Docs.returns: The records found by the vector search, including their result scores.
